level.heading: Initiating and responding tribunal of the District.
level.text: Under this chapter, the Family Division may serve as an initiating tribunal to forward proceedings to another state and as a responding tribunal for proceedings initiated in another state.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 46-301.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 203 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
